message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $12000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you consider $10000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $11000.
